text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion

Alright, this is it.
Here you go, Amana.
Thank you!

Wow...!
It's quite heavy!

Haha...
Well, it's a proper camera.

It may not be as convenient as a smartphone,
but... I'm sure you can take great photos.

Yeah...! That's how it feels...!
And it has various buttons too.

Ah, I'll show you how to use it.
By the way, what are you going to use it for?
Well...

I want to take lots of beautiful photos
of Chiyuki-san and keep them as memories!
Ah... I see...

But you don't need to worry.
There will be a photographer on the day.
Yeah, that's true, but...!

It'll be an important day,
so I want lots of records made by us, too.
That makes sense... Alright, I'll teach you.
Thank you!

Oh, by the way...
Since it's for everyone's memories,

I'll make sure producer-san is also
properly included in the photos!
